mean_cn: adj.宽松的；（指言行等）不严谨的；  v.松开
mean_en: not fitting closely; not firmly fixed where it should be; able to become separated from something; not tied together; not held in position by anything or contained in anything; free to move around without control; not tied up or shut in somewhere
sentence: "I've lost so much weight that my old pants are too loose to wear!"
sentence_trans: “我瘦了好多，以前的裤子都松得不能穿了！”
